rdf:Description.dc:title: Northern perspectives : northern Alberta into the '90s : Conference summary report, November 21-23, 1990, Grande Prairie, Alberta 1991 northern Alberta into the '90s : Conference summary report, November 21-23, 1990, Grande Prairie, Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Northern Alberta Development Council. Conference (1990 : Grande Prairie, Alta.)
Northern Alberta Development Council.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Peace River, Alta.] : Northern Alberta Development Council,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Proceedings of the Northern Perspectives Conference, held in Grande Prairie, Alberta, 21-23 November 1991. Focus was on the changes and challenges facing northern Alberta in the 1990s as they will affect all segments of the northern economy.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Regional planning
Human services
